name: Solvay SA
membership: Solvay is, among others, a member of BusinessEurope, ERT, Cefic, PlasticsEurope
goal:
SOLVAY in brief

- TOP 10 worldwide largest chemical player
- Among the world leaders in selected markets and products, generating over 90% of sales in businesses where it is among the top 3 global
- Global and balanced presence in all growth regions (37% of sales in North and South America, 33% of net sales in Europe and 30% of net sales in Asia Pacific)
- EUR 10.9 billion in net sales in 2016
- EUR 2.3 billion total EBITDA in 2016
- 27,000 people worldwide 2016
- 140 industrial sites 2016
- Worldwide presence in 58 countries
- 21 major R&D centers
- Diversified end-markets such as aerospace, automotive, construction, consumer goods, energy, water and environment and electronics
- Strategy of sustainable and profitable growth by investing in high value added activities and new products with low energy footprint
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
